trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> evento se desencadena cuando una <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control intenta cambiar entre edición, inserción y modo de solo lectura, pero antes de que cambie realmente el modo.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Esto le permite proporcionar un controlador de eventos que realiza una rutina personalizada, como configurar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controlar para un modo concreto o cancelar el cambio de modo, siempre que se produce este evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante programación un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventHandler> delegar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> eventos de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante declaración un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventHandler> delegar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> eventos de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
